channel.title: Hand Cannon Shots
channel.description:
Hey all,
When i try to shoot with my hand cannon it says you cant use hand cannon shots on your hand cannon
How can i fix this?
Greetings, Dion

Hmm an you this with teamviewer?

item.title: Hand Cannon Shots
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Find the ‘else’ statement handling the cannon and change the arrow or bolt ID to cannon ball.
Thats probably not right, or easier, I could tell you if i had a source in front of me but I don’t I’ll get back to you tomorrow, when I look at a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Hand Cannon Shots
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Groen Mod Groen
item.description:
@Mod_Groen wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:401059”]You have to make it use hand cannon shots…
Instead of an arrow or bolt id for the cannon, find the else statement and change the bolt or arrow id to the cannon ball.[/quote]

Sorry i do not understand it can you explain bit easier?

Read full topic

item.title: Hand Cannon Shots
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You have to make it use hand cannon shots…
Instead of an arrow or bolt id for the cannon, find the else statement and change the bolt or arrow id to the cannon ball.
